query:
SELECT 
  prefecture, 
  city, 
  property_type,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  AVG(price_yen) as avg_price,
  MIN(price_yen) as min_price,
  MAX(price_yen) as max_price,
  AVG(unit_price_yen_per_m2) as avg_unit_price
FROM transactions 
WHERE prefecture = '東京都' AND city LIKE '%小平%'
GROUP BY prefecture, city, property_type
LIMIT 20;
